title: [Large-Scale] Mobile-Based Intensive Reading Comprehension Strategy Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Literacy Skills and Understanding of College-Level Social Studies Content
context.additional_context: Modular content optimized for smartphone-centered learning environments with real-time feedback via formative assessments

learning_goals: Learners can apply strategies to extract main ideas from various text types (academic papers, current affairs commentaries) with over 80% accuracy
Learners can self-assess their level of text comprehension using metacognitive question-generation techniques
Learners can structure core content within 15 minutes using summarization and note-taking strategies in digital environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
